rows.label: qst712102_msg0001
rows.name:
Mo? You looking for more detailed
explanation of Fusion Combo?

rows.label: qst712102_msg0002
rows.name:
Is very powerful technique that
fuse Blade Combo and Driver Combo
together into single supercombo!

rows.label: qst712102_msg0003
rows.name:
Can start with Blade Combo
or Driver Combo first, it
not really matter.

rows.label: qst712102_msg0004
rows.name:
Also, many added benefits to
Fusion Combo. Extends Party Gauge
and combo duration time too!

rows.label: qst712102_msg0005
rows.name:
Tough to pull off maybe, yes, but
if can achieve, is way to draw out
max potential of Driver and Blade!

rows.label: qst712102_msg0006
rows.name:
That conclude Fusion Combo
summary! Now friends hup to and
give Gororo ten Fusion Combos!

rows.label: qst712102_msg0007
rows.name:
And be wise with choosing of enemies.
Very wise, very careful. And take
plenty of time! All time in Alst!

rows.label: qst712102_msg0101
rows.name:
H...how? How this possible?!
Friends are...are...unreal!

rows.label: qst712102_msg0102
rows.name:
Mo? You want to hear about what
ultra tough mission entail?

rows.label: qst712102_msg0104
rows.name:
...Gororo and Kurogane take so much
time with testing of candidates,
actually got kicked off mission!

rows.label: qst712102_msg0105
rows.name:
Hahaha! Gororo is such silly-
billypon! Should have been
more attention-paying!

rows.label: qst712102_msg0107
rows.name:
Hey, these thing happen in field of
work of mercenaries. Cannot help!
Please not to look at with deathstares!

rows.label: qst712102_msg0108
rows.name:
But is not all for nothing, me realize
that now. Had opportunity to meet
incredible Driver-and-Blade-friends!

rows.label: qst712102_msg0109
rows.name:
Yes, is all worth coming
to far-flung land of Iira
to meet new friends!

rows.label: qst712102_msg0110
rows.name:
Also, while on subject,
and if friends forgive
Gororo little digression...

rows.label: qst712102_msg0111
rows.name:
Lack of mission mean lot more
time for sightseeing of sights
of Iira! Plenty of walky-walks!

rows.label: qst712102_msg0112
rows.name:
Hope to see friends again on travels,
so please not to forget names and
faces of Gororo and Kurogane!
